text:
Could Demi Lovato be collaborating with one of the Latin industry’s biggest stars — Luis Fonsi? The Disney Channel alum recently revealed that she was working on a Spanish-language project. She told Buzzfeed, “You will have to wait and find out because I recorded something recently that I think you will like.”

Earlier this week, Luis and Demi fueled rumors that they've teamed up for a project after exchanging messages on Instagram. The 25-year-old shared a photo of herself getting ready to shoot a music video, which Luis commented on in Spanish writing, “What’s up Demi...” The Confident singer later commented on a photo of Luis wrapping a video on set writing, “Hi Fonsi.... 😜.”

CLICK FOR FULL GALLERY

Music video shoot ☺️ A post shared by Demi Lovato (@ddlovato) on Oct 21, 2017 at 4:26pm PDT

MORE: Luis Fonsi talks to HOLA! USA about having the song of the summer

Back in August, Luis — who previously worked with Justin Bieber on his record-breaking song Despacito — revealed to HOLA! USA that he had an “amazing collaboration” in the works, but couldn’t disclose at the time which artist was on the track. He explained, “It’s a secret because we are still working on it literally as we speak.”

Finished! It’s a wrap 🎥 A post shared by Luis Fonsi (@luisfonsi) on Oct 21, 2017 at 8:55pm PDT

While Luis kept mum on who he was collaborating with, the 39-year-old admitted that he would love to work with Demi. “There’s a lot of females out there. When I think about an amazing collaboration it would probably be Rihanna. Demi, I think she’s great,” he said. As for a collaboration with Demi, Luis added: “That’d be pretty badass.”
title: Luis Fonsi would love to work with Demi Lovato — so is it happening?
